document_data.name: Kiwi
document_data.mainbody: '''Kiwis''' were uncommon exotic fruit exported from [[Snowdown]]'s North Coast.
document_data.Description: Famous for its exquisite taste, kiwis had thin brown skin covered with unusual fuzz.
document_data.Availability: Kiwis originated from Snowdown and were considered a rare delicacy outside the [[Moonshae Isles]]. These fruits were imported from their native region and could be found in some locations and establishments in the [[Western Heartlands]].
